column1: Today on #VeteransDay we celebrate and express our appreciation to the generations of Americans who have served. Thank you. https://t.co/345PdGGWbY

ANOTHER 🚨. My opponent won’t condemn QAnon! Our FBI calls it a domestic terror threat! Her extremist campaign of lies continues!
🚨 My opponent cozies up to the NRA refusing to support common sense bipartisan gun reform. Her extremist gun-loving campaign of lies continues.
I will ALWAYS support common sense gun reform and was proud to vote in favor of the Assault Weapons Ban.

Again my opponent’s desperate campaign of lies continues.  Here’s the truth: I’ve introduced dozens of bills including bills to fix our student debt crisis bring down cost of prescriptions support our veterans protect LGBTQ youth take on the evil Maduro regime and many more
My opponent resorts to desperate lies and false attacks to avoid talking about Trumps’ failures. This president turned a crisis into a tragedy.
We need to starve this virus to get our economy back on track. That’s why I worked to pass the CARES Act and the HEROES Act.

More lies from my opponent. Here’s the truth: When I was Secretary of HHS we:  - Created national stockpile to prepare for pandemics (Trump admin let it run out)  - Passed an assault weapons ban  - Created CHIP which now covers more than 8 million children
Fact: Republicans are currently trying to get rid of Obamacare and weaken its key protections. Healthcare is on the ballot.
Tune in as I lay out my plans and record of getting things done and beat back against my opponent’s desperate lies about me and our campaign. https://t.co/bzzkGG4UKg

Fact Check: Trump and the Republicans are deporting Venezuelans and my opponent remains silent to this tragic injustice. Hecho: Trump y los republicanos están deportando venezolanos y mi oponente guarda silencio ante esta trágica injusticia. https://t.co/NO29T5fOQa

#DREAMers are here to stay. And I will continue to fight against Republican efforts to take their rights away.  Los #DREAMers están aquí para quedarse. Yo continuaré luchando contra los esfuerzos de los republicanos para quitarles sus derechos.
Fact check: I’m a cosponsor of the bill denouncing socialism.  Hecho: yo copatrociné el proyecto de ley denunciando el socialismo

Cerca de 100.000 personas en #FL27 dependen de Obamacare. Yo lucharé siempre por un cuidado de la salud asequible y de alta calidad esto mientras los republicanos pelean en la Corte para arrebatar el cuidado de la salud a la gente. #SalazarSinPena
Nearly 100000 people in #FL27 depend on Obamacare. I will always fight for affordable high-quality healthcare. Meanwhile Republicans are working to take away healthcare in the courts right now.

Una vez más mi oponente está mintiendo. Mis constituyentes siempre son nuestra prioridad. Incluyendo la ciudadana que mi oponente menciona. De hecho estamos orgullosos de haber sido premiados por nuestro servicio a nuestros constituyentes.

My opponent is lying once again. My office has always prioritized our constituents including the constituent my opponent mentioned. In fact we are so proud to have been awarded a constituent services award.

Las campañas desesperadas recurren a mentir sobre sus oponentes. Hacer acusaciones falsas sobre mi historial inequívoco de luchar contra el socialismo no hace ningún favor a los miles de personas de nuestra comunidad que han huido de regímenes dictatoriales y socialistas. #FL27

Desperate campaigns resort to lying about their opponents. Making false accusations about my unequivocal record of fighting against socialism does a disservice to the thousands in our community who have fled dictatorial socialist regimes. #SalazarSinPena

As @JoeBiden made clear this election is about us the American people and how we will come together to end this health crisis and get our economy back on track.   Because the other choice (refusing to denounce white supremacy!) is simply not an option.
Tonight’s “debate” was a sobering dark reminder of what’s at stake this November.

Yom Kippur is the holiest day on the Hebrew calendar. To our Jewish friends and neighbors observing the holiday I wish you an easy fast and meaningful day of reflection and introspection.

I’m proud and humbled to be endorsed by President @BarackObama today. As he has has said time and again this election is critical to defending our democracy expanding access to healthcare and rebuilding our economy. Make your voice heard: https://t.co/1aCaY7tLgJ https://t.co/5Ek1t0qCIR

I won’t rest until we’re safe and our economy is back on track.   Since COVID-19 hit we’ve passed relief bills to assist unemployed workers and small businesses. Now it’s time to build back better—together. https://t.co/S3q6g8MH5I

I'm honored to have the support of @HRC. Their fight to end discrimination and achieve full equality for LGBTQ individuals has improved the lives of millions and I'm proud to be fighting with them. https://t.co/4EqNWC6Hk2
Justice Ginsburg was a giant in civil and human rights. As we remember her life and honor her legacy I’m deeply grateful for all that she did in the fight for equality.

I first met Ruth Bader Ginsburg when we both taught at Columbia in the 1970s. Long before her appointment to the Supreme Court she fought to make sure women have the same opportunities as men. https://t.co/plWrLS4rnq

I’m honored to have the support of Miami’s Community Newspapers. In their endorsement they recognized our work fighting for healthcare combatting climate change and standing up to dictators.    As we recover from COVID I’ll always fight for you on the issues that matter most. https://t.co/jyRk5fhRK0

I’ve known Ruth Bader Ginsburg for four decades.  As a woman and mother she faced discrimination all too familiar to so many of us. She brought that experience to the court and fought for equality at every turn.   May her memory be an inspiration and blessing.
Shanah Tovah to all who are celebrating Rosh Hashanah! My team and I hope that you and your families have a sweet and happy New Year. https://t.co/C13tFGfoU0

Belleau Wood is hallowed ground. A resting place for heroes and patriots who made the ultimate sacrifice in service of their country.  Service patriotism and sacrifice - virtues Donald Trump does not have and will never know.

Today the @SouthFlaAFLCIO announced their support for my campaign. I've always fought for an economy that supports and empowers our workforce and I share in their commitment to protecting Florida workers. I'm honored to have earned their endorsement. https://t.co/qGkESQpraJ
Generations of immigrants have built America into the greatest country in the world.  Donald Trump wants to destroy the immigrant heritage that fueled our prosperity.

Senator Kamala Harris is an extraordinary choice to be our next vice president.  The Biden-Harris ticket is a winning combination.

With their help I will continue to advocate for gun safety in Florida and across the nation. We need to keep families safe with common-sense gun safety reform.

Today the Supreme Court took a historic step to protect LGBTQ+ people from discrimination. https://t.co/AhqfeSab1t

To those who are out there making your voice heard: I am listening.   https://t.co/XKv9k5GVxc

Systemic racism in our country is unacceptable and it’s on all of us to demand change. We need to stand with peaceful protesters and promise Black Americans that we will not wait until tomorrow to fight for change.
If you think your vote doesn't matter you haven't been paying attention.

I’ll be joining @TeamJoe for a workshop tomorrow to let older Americans know how they can help bring principled leadership back to the White House.   You can join us tomorrow at 2:00 PM EDT by going to https://t.co/bb5dkEt9Gn. We hope to see you there! https://t.co/BAzrhbjNO8

Today we remember the heroes who fought and died to preserve the integrity of our nation. I hope you and your family have a wonderful weekend. https://t.co/YEYQssRmGf

@ratemyskyperoom Tough but fair.

Advice we should follow https://t.co/9iuqBr2TqA
I’m proud to fight for our community’s safety alongside @MomsDemand America’s largest grassroots volunteer network dedicated to ending gun violence.

Common-sense gun violence prevention measures have bipartisan support. If we work together we can keep guns out of the hands of domestic abusers pass universal background checks and implement red flag laws nationwide. https://t.co/hI5zngGfgB
Today I hope you'll join me in celebrating our planet and renewing our collective commitment to protecting the earth for generations to come.

This Earth Day we can't forget that we're running out of time to fight climate change. With rising sea levels increasingly frequent hurricanes and unprecedented heat waves we need to act to protect communities in South Florida and across our country. https://t.co/NeEuXCCY0c
As this crisis intensifies our brave healthcare workers need the resources they need to keep our community safe. I’ll never stop fighting for these hardworking heroes.  https://t.co/gL2tazikYj

Florida didn’t receive its fair share of hospital funding during the first round of payments from the CARES Act. As Former Secretary of HHS I understand how this system works and I’ve worked with Sec. Azar to ensure this problem is rectified during the next round of payments.

I’m glad that Gov. DeSantis increased the DEO’s staff and server capacity but we need to do more to ensure Floridians can safely receive full benefits. This is about people’s livelihood—their ability to pay rent to buy food to take care of their families. We need to do better.

We fought hard for expanded unemployment benefits in the CARES Act. Here in Florida unemployed Floridians have been forced to wait in long crowded lines to pick up paper unemployment applications. https://t.co/sc4ugYug5E

I know this is a difficult time and celebrating without large gatherings will be different. For those who celebrate Easter or Passover I hope you find joy in this celebration connect with family members even though we may be apart and have a wonderful holiday weekend. https://t.co/WVosnetkbZ
I will always work tirelessly for our students families and communities in South Florida and around the country to prevent gun violence.
